summary: Sir John Cowdery Kendrew CBE FRS  was an English biochemist and crystallographer.
full_text: Sir John Cowdery Kendrew, CBE, FRS  was an English biochemist and crystallographer who shared the 1962 Nobel Prize in Chemistry with Max Perutz; their group in the Cavendish Laboratory investigated the structure of heme-containing proteins.
title: John Kendrew
